main.description: A collection/group of items (activities and/or other collections). Collections support recursive nesting.

type.description: The type of this collection. Possible fields can be 'favorites', 'project', or any other type of collection.

shortDescription.description: Short summary of this collection, suitable for previews and list views

description.description: Rich-text description, represented as a Leaflet linear document.

avatar.description: The collection's avatar/profile image as a URI or image blob.

banner.description: Larger horizontal image to display behind the collection view.

items.description: Array of items in this collection with optional weights.

location.description: A strong reference to the location where this collection's activities were performed. The record referenced must conform with the lexicon app.certified.location.

createdAt.description: Client-declared timestamp when this record was originally created

itemIdentifier.description: Strong reference to an item in this collection. Items can be activities (org.hypercerts.claim.activity) and/or other collections (org.hypercerts.claim.collection).

itemWeight.description: Optional weight for this item (positive numeric value stored as string). Weights do not need to sum to a specific total; normalization can be performed by the consuming application as needed.
